wikitext.*:
On [[29 July]] [[1966]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Max Roulsin'''.<ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]], "[http://www.hammondandscull.com/addenda/chronology.html Addenda and Corrigenda to The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology]" at [http://www.hammondandscull.com/index.html HammondandScull.com] (accessed 22 October 2011)</ref>

*'''Subject''':  Hardback editions of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (reply to a reader). 
*'''Publication:''' None.
*'''Description:''' One page, 7 x 9, blind stamped personal letterhead.<ref>[http://rrauction.com/past_auction_item.cfm?ID=3200964 Item 553 - J.R.R. Tolkien Catalog 351 (Nov 2009)] at [http://rrauction.com RR Auction] (accessed 22 October 2011)</ref>
